definition: to purchase/to buy/to do one's shopping/purchasing agent/buyer
to pick/to pluck/to collect/to select/to choose/to gather

sentences.english: This initial contact can help them decide where to shop.
sentences.chinese: 這個初步的接觸，可以協助他們決定該到哪兒去採買。

sentences.english: I know. I still need to do my last minute shopping.
sentences.chinese: 是啊，我還有最後關頭的採買要辦呢。

sentences.english: Nicole:Yeah, going to the store all the time was becoming quite a chore.
sentences.chinese: 沒錯，老是去採買已經變成一件無聊的工作了。
我們通常到鄰近的商店採買。

definition: gift given when visiting sb (esp. a local specialty brought back from one's travels, or a special product of one's own country taken overseas) (Tw)
market/store/mall (usually specializing in a particular product category such as furniture)
take-out (fast food)/(outer part of) tire/as well/besides/into the bargain/outer zone
to return from a rewarding journey
to pay the bill/to settle accounts/also written 結賬|结账
to amuse oneself/to have fun/to go sightseeing/to take a stroll
